desc: Le Lumiére Candles are 100% Eco Friendly Vegan and Sustainable Soy Wax Candles made with Safe and Cruelty Free Natural Fragrances to create a strong but not over-powering scents. We hand-pour our candles in small batches to ensure quality and performance.

layout.text:
Our Candles are small batch, eco-friendly
Soy Candles hand poured in Los Angeles, CA.
